name: SmartZip
tagline: Predictive analytics platform that predicted 72% of listings using AI
description: SmartZip aggregates hundreds of data points from more than 25 sources and uses AI-powered predictive analytics to determine homeowners most likely to move within 6-12 months. With 72% prediction accuracy and over one billion data points analyzed, it provides agents with a CRM pre-populated with warm seller leads.
cons: Best suited for listing agents only
